item.title: 2020-07-29 18:30 Developer Relations Sweden meetup #3 - Open Source and DevRel - Stockholm Developer Relations
item.description: Friends, the basic requirement for any meetup we do is that you all feel safe and have fun. We follow the good practices and shall postpone this meetup to sometime late April or May when we hope the the world is in a better shape. We will keep everyone updated via email. <...
